channel.title: Need help on a simplish code please?
channel.description:
Right, i may sound stupid here but hey, i did coding a while back, few years maybe... and i need a code that when i type ::ko (nick) it will hit a 200 on them. also i need it for owner only
And some of you may have been to a server with skillcapes? well, has anyone tried the defence cape? when you do the skill, a big yellow thing comes over u with a bit of red? lol.. i want it do that emote/gfx idk, hitting the 200.
please help

ask them lol, never seen it before

item.title: Need help on a simplish code please?
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

hmmm…i don’t think that’s possible, but here’s somthin u should be able to do
type ::ko
add’s an item that MAKES you hit 200+(saying they got 200+ hp)
and it does that emote, which iunno the id to

Read full topic
